thread.title: Excellent Hotel -
thread.title_full: Excellent Hotel - Review of Hotel Saint-Marc, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Peter I
title: Excellent Hotel -
text:
We enjoyed a very comfortable stay in this modern hotel with Art Deco (or possibly Art Nouveau) decoration. The reception staff were very friendly and helpful. Buffet breakfast was good. The other plus point of this hotel was its central location and only minutes away from the metro.
Room Tip: Room was very comfortable. Despite central location it was reasonably quiet. See more room tips
